20101227174239.000|20101227174241.000|TR0|Roosevelt Island, which is an island in 
20101227174241.000|20101227174244.000|TR0|the middle of the east river.
20101227174244.000|20101227174246.000|TR0|
20101227174246.000|20101227174248.000|TR0|Please hold on while the cabin is docking. 
20101227174248.000|20101227174251.000|TR0| My shift is from 10:00 at night to 6:00 
20101227174251.000|20101227174253.000|TR0|in the morning.  The skyline of Manhattan

20101227175628.000|20101227175631.000|TR0|PATRICK OPPMANN, CNN CORRESPONDENT 
20101227175631.000|20101227175633.000|TR0|(voice-over): Christmas in this small 
20101227175633.000|20101227175635.000|TR0|Cuban town starts with a bang. Lots of 
20101227175635.000|20101227175638.000|TR0|them. Local fireworks specialists called 
20101227175638.000|20101227175640.000|TR0|artieros (ph) light the fuses. Crowds take 
20101227175640.000|20101227175643.000|TR0|in the show, and take cover. These 
20101227175643.000|20101227175645.000|TR0|pyrotechnics will go on for another 12 
20101227175645.000|20101227175647.000|TR0|hours.
20101227175647.000|20101227175650.000|TR0|
20101227175650.000|20101227175652.000|TR0|This is Ramedios. Usually a sleepy place, 
20101227175652.000|20101227175654.000|TR0|until Christmas Eve. That's when Las 
20101227175654.000|20101227175657.000|TR0|Parrandas start up. The street festivals 
20101227175657.000|20101227175659.000|TR0|began over 200 years ago to lure Ramedios 
20101227175659.000|20101227175702.000|TR0|citizens to the town's midnight mass. But 
20101227175702.000|20101227175704.000|TR0|the town priest says Las Parrandas now 
20101227175704.000|20101227175706.000|TR0|dwarf the services.
20101227175706.000|20101227175709.000|TR0|
20101227175709.000|20101227175711.000|TR0|"We're afraid that rockets will fly into 
20101227175711.000|20101227175713.000|TR0|the church and kill someone," he says, "so 
20101227175713.000|20101227175716.000|TR0|we have canceled mass."

20101227175718.000|20101227175721.000|TR0|The homemade fireworks dazzle, when they 
20101227175721.000|20101227175723.000|TR0|fly up.
20101227175723.000|20101227175725.000|TR0|

20101227175728.000|20101227175730.000|TR0|much more than just a celebration. They 
20101227175730.000|20101227175732.000|TR0|are also a competition between two rival 
20101227175732.000|20101227175735.000|TR0|neighborhoods, San Salvador and El Carmen.
